title: T206 Demmitt St. Louis - Nice PSA 3
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T206 Demmitt St. Louis - Nice PSA 3
posts.post_content:
Posted By: BlackSoxFan
I'm revisiting the sale of this card.  This is a very nice 3 but does have a crease that is about 1/4 of the way down the card.  I don't think it is quite as dramatic in person as it is in the scan - that's what a nice scanner will do for you.   I would say - it's a 3.5 if sent in again.
Best offer....

[IMG]http://www.blacksoxfan.com/images/cards/t206_demmitt_stl.jpg[/IMG]


Regards,

Black Sox Fan
